Package nzilbb.util

Class Execution

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.util.Execution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public class Execution
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Manages the execution of an external program, ensuring that streams are processed, etc.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz
